name: Veers (V)
Lore: 'General of the AT-AT assault armor division sent by Darth Vader to crush the Rebellion on Hoth. Cold and ruthless.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  Deploys -2 to Hoth.  Your combat vehicles are defense value +1 at same and related locations.  While on Hoth, your AT-ATs and Imperials are deploy -1 and forfeit +1 at related locations.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
